entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 6:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: NE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain this evening. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
